item.description:
Train Ride
Excursions along the shores of Lake Winnipesaukee weekends from from Meredith Station. 154 Main Street, Meredith, NH 03253 at 12:30 or 2:30 for a two hour trip depending on availablity.
Adults $14.00
Purchase tickets at the station.; Dollar discount coupon available at http://www.shaws.com/....
Train information


Lunch at the LakeHouse restaurant 281 Daniel Webster Hwy
Meredith, NH 03253
Lake house Lunch Menu

& a trip to Annalee doll outlet shop as time permits
The new Annalee Museum is now open and located in the Annalee Outlet building at 50 Reservoir Road in Meredith, NH. The museum is home to memorabilia and artifacts relating to the history of Annalee. A personal tour of the new Annlaee Museum offers an intimate view of the dolls through an unparalleled collection of these original felt and wire hand created dolls, as well as vintage photos and memorabilia.

Carpool can be arranged from Nashua, Rte 3 Exit 6.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Foilage train ride Meredith NH
